short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: [changes crypto currency terms to pirate-y things]

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes Crypto phrases on websites like 'bitcoin' to Pirate-y things like 'pieces of eight' using a regex command. Very simple, light script, won't steal any of your data to make NFTs.
